original_text: Jehoiada and his sons brought the king's son out of the temple room. They put the crown onto Joash's head. They gave him a copy of the royal covenant. They poured olive oil on his head to show that he was now the king. They shouted, ‘May the king have a long life!’
korean_text: 무리가 왕자를 인도해 내어 면류관을 씌우며 율법책을 주고 세워 왕으로 삼을새 여호야다와 그의 아들들이 그에게 기름을 붓고 이르기를 왕이여 만세 수를 누리소서 하니라

sentences.original_text: Jehoiada and his sons brought the king's son out of the temple room
sentences.korean_translation: 여호야다와 그의 아들들이 왕의 아들을 성전 방에서 데려왔습니다

sentences.original_text: They put the crown onto Joash's head
They gave him a copy of the royal covenant
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 그에게 왕의 계약서 사본을 주었습니다

sentences.original_text: They poured olive oil on his head
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 그의 머리에 올리브 기름을 부었습니다

sentences.original_text: to show that he was now the king
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 이제 왕이 되었음을 보여주기 위해

sentences.original_text: They shouted, 'May the king have a long life!'
